title: Routine repair and maintenance; definitions
context: [PART VII.] ROUTINE REPAIR AND MAINTENANCE Cross References Judiciary-owned buildings and facilities; routine repair and maintenance annual reports, see ยง601-2. [ยง37-121] Routine repair and maintenance; definitions. As used in this part: &ldquo;Routine repair and maintenance&rdquo; means repair and maintenance performed on a scheduled repair and maintenance cycle. &ldquo;State-owned building, facility, or other improvement&rdquo; means a building, facility, or other improvement owned and managed by a state executive agency. The term shall not include a state-owned building, facility, or other improvement that is leased by a state executive agency to a person. [L 2016, c 233, pt of ยง2]
